<title level="1" pfs="">[Takatorra (Level 9)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1447)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 36

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 34

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 9">[Takatorra (Level 9)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1447)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Tengu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=240" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 11</row>

**Perception** +20; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Nagaji](/Languages.aspx?ID=87), [Tengu](/Languages.aspx?ID=47), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +17, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +21, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +15, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +15

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +2

**Con** +4

**Int** +1

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
_+1 [hide armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7)_, _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [tengu gale blade](/Weapons.aspx?ID=128)_ (2)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 26 

**Fort** +21 

**Ref** +17 

**Will** +20 

</row>

**HP** 210

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tengu gale blade +22 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d6+10 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
beak +21 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d6+10 piercing

**Blade Barrage** <actions string="Two Actions" />  Takatorra makes three melee Strikes. These Strikes gain the [forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180) trait. If one target is hit with at least two of these Strikes, they also take 1d6 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). The target is then [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) until they heal the persistent bleed damage.

**Disarming Whirl** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Flourish](/Traits.aspx?ID=73)) Takatorra spins, striking at their foes' weapons. Takatorra attempts an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) against each enemy within melee reach. Each attempt counts toward Takatorra's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until they have made all the attempts.

**Soaring Flight** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Morph](/Traits.aspx?ID=113), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** Takatorra expands their wings, gaining a 25-foot fly Speed for 5 minutes.

</column>
name: Takatorra (Level 9)

These Strikes gain the forceful trait. If one target is hit with at least two of these Strikes, they also take 1d6 persistent bleed damage. The target is then flat-footed until they heal the persistent bleed damage. Disarming Whirl Two Actions (Flourish) Takatorra spins, striking at their foes' weapons. Takatorra attempts an Athletics check to Disarm against each enemy within melee reach. Each attempt counts toward Takatorra's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until they have made all the attempts. Soaring Flight Two Actions (Morph, Primal, Transmutation) Frequency once per day; Effect Takatorra expands their wings, gaining a 25-foot fly Speed for 5 minutes.
